WRITING.TEXT: Your boyfriend sounds like an amazing partner! Enjoy your vacation, you deserve it 3

UGH YES TO THIS. I have the exact same problem. If I gain even a fraction of a pound, I spend the rest of my day stewing in self-hatred. But if I lose? It's like my brain decides that means it's time to binge.
So please just know you're not alone. It's fucking hard and as much as I want to stop weighing myself daily I'm so scared that if I do I'll instantly gain.

* **Breakfast**: 200g Fage Total 2%, 20g Fiber One Bran Cereal, 4g Truvia Baking Blend, 28g Trader Joe's Omega Trek Mix (370) * **Lunch**: 300g Fage Total 2% with Cherry Preserves (280) * **Dinner**: 200g Fage Total 2%, 32g Quest Cookies Cream Protein Powder, 19g Peanut Butter Co Dark Chocolate Dreams (350)
**TOTAL**: 1000

* **Breakfast**: Stack, Orange Yogurt Raisins (60) * **Lunch**: Stack, 56g Trader Joe's Sweet Uncured Sriracha Bacon Jerky (280) * **Dinner**: Stack, 284g Halo Top Birthday Cake (280)
**TOTAL**: 620
This weekend wasn't as bad as I thought it'd be. I fasted until dinner time (easy to pull off as I was hungover/tired and not hungry), and ate Poke bowls for dinner both nights. We also walked around a lot so I'm hoping I burned off at least some of what I ate.
